member.name: M:rencopy.Program.CopyAndRename(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Performs the copy and rename operation using the specified config file

member.name: P:rencopy.RenCopyConfig.TextReplacementFileExtensions
member.summary: The file extensions to do text replacements on

member.name: P:rencopy.RenCopyConfig.CopyAllFiles
member.summary: Indicates whether to copy all files or just those specified by the TextReplacementFileExtensions and CopyExtensions properties

member.name: P:rencopy.RenCopyConfig.CopyExtensions
member.summary: The file extenions to copy without doing text replacements

member.name: P:rencopy.RenCopyConfig.Ignore
member.summary: The names or patterns of file names or folder names to ignore
